creator: glennoph@yahoo.com
text:
When extracting a zip file, provide a verbose listing of the files that were 
created or replace in the file system.

and/or provide a zip verbose listing that does not extract files but lists the 
files in the zip file.

Thanks,
Glenn

looks as if the unzip/tar tasks have more or less always logged something like

"expanding foo/bar.txt to /some/path/foo/bar.txt"

at the verbose level.

svn revision 804902 will log some extra information if an entry is not extracted because it didn't match any provided include patterns (or matched an exclude).
creator: bodewig@apache.org
